titleStmt.title: A discourse explaining the nature of edification both of particular persons in private graces, and of the church in unity and peace, and shewing that we must not break unity and publick peace, for supposed means of better edifying in private virtues : in a visitation sermon at Coventry, May 7, 1684 / by John Kettlewell ...
titleStmt.author: Kettlewell, John, 1653-1695.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
